CommandDefinition.Name: instantiatesharedresourcesynchronizer
CommandDefinition.Description: Instantiates a shared resource synchronizer with the given type and configuration.

Argument.Name: startOption
Argument.Description: start: Start the synchronizer after instantiation; stop: Do not start the synchronizer, nextStart: Start the synchronizer with the next factory start. Default: stop

Argument.Name: synchronizerType
Argument.Description: Type of the shared resource synchronizer to instantiate.

Argument.Name: instanceName
Argument.Description: Name of the shared resource synchronizer instance.

Argument.Name: configuration
Argument.Description: Configuration parameters for the shared resource synchronizer as key=value pairs
